text: duniyaavee zidagee kee masal to bas paanee kee see hai ki hamane usako aasamaan se barasaaya phir zameen ke saag paat jisako log aur chaupae kha jaate hain (usake saath mil julakar nikale yahaan tak ki jab zameen ne (phasal kee cheezon se) apana banao singaar kar liya aur (har tarah) aaraasta ho gaee aur khet vaalon ne samajh liya ki ab vah us par yaqeenan qaaboo pa gae (jab chaahenge kaat lege) yakaayak hamaara hukm va azaab raat ya din ko aa pahuncha to hamane us khet ko aisa saaph kata hua bana diya ki goya kul usamen kuchh tha hee nahin jo log gaur va phikr karate hain unake vaaste ham aayaton ko yoon taphaseeladaar bayaan karate hai
